content.query:
USE realtor;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'realtor')
 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE realtor
 WITH (
     location = 'abfss://realtor@dlsprimarystorage.dfs.core.windows.net'
 )
GO

-- auto-generated code
